testcase.classname: New User Could Create New Account By Going To Registration Page
testcase.name: Successfully, New User Could Register With Valid Data
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to home page................................................passed When user pressed on Register link..........................................passed And user chooses gender.....................................................passed And user enters first name..................................................passed And user enters last name...................................................passed And user chooses birth of date..............................................passed And user enters email address...............................................passed And user enters company name................................................passed And user chooses Newsletter option..........................................passed And user enters password....................................................passed And user enters confirm password............................................passed And user pressed on REGISTER button.........................................passed Then display "Your registration completed" message to user..................passed And user log-in successfully and log-out link appears in the header.........passed And user pressed on Log-out link............................................passed

testcase.name: User could log in with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user had an actual account............................................passed And user goes to home page..................................................passed When user pressed on Log-in link in the header..............................passed And user enters email address in login page.................................passed And user enters password....................................................passed And user pressed on Log-in button...........................................passed Then user log-in successfully...............................................passed And user pressed on Log-out link............................................passed

testcase.name: User could reset his password successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user had an actual account............................................passed And user goes to home page..................................................passed When user pressed on Log-in link in the header..............................passed And user presses on forgot password link....................................passed And user enters email address in login page.................................passed And user presses on Recover button..........................................passed Then display message "Email with instructions has been sent to you."at the top for user.passed

testcase.name: Guest User could search for any product using name
testcase.system-out: Given user had an actual account............................................passed And open home page again....................................................passed When user presses on search box.............................................passed And write "apple" in the search box.........................................passed And user presses on search button...........................................passed Then user will find all related products....................................passed

testcase.name: Guest User could search for any product using SKU
testcase.system-out: Given user had an actual account............................................passed And open home page again....................................................passed When user presses on search box.............................................passed And write "N_1020_LU" in the search box.....................................passed And user presses on search button...........................................passed Then user will find "Nokia Lumia 1020"......................................passed

testcase.name: Guest User could switch between currencies US-Euro
testcase.system-out: Given user had an actual account............................................passed And open home page again....................................................passed When user chooses from currency dropdown list...............................passed Then verification process from currency.....................................passed

testcase.name: Guest user could select different Categories
testcase.system-out: Given user had an actual account............................................passed And open home page again....................................................passed When user chooses category randomly.........................................passed Then user return to the choosed category page...............................passed

testcase.name: user could filter product with color
testcase.system-out: Given user had an actual account............................................passed And open home page again....................................................passed When user chooses Category and hover to open sub-Category...................passed And user can filter sub-Category with color.................................passed Then user will find product with the selected color.........................passed

testcase.name: Logged user could select different tags
testcase.system-out: Given user had an actual account............................................passed And open home page again....................................................passed When user chooses Category and hover to open sub-Category...................passed And user chooses a popular tag..............................................passed And user will find products.................................................passed Then user chooses a different tag...........................................passed And user will find another different products...............................passed

testcase.name: User choose a product and click on ADD TO CART button
testcase.system-out: Given user had an actual account............................................passed And open home page again....................................................passed When user scrolls down to products..........................................passed And user chooses product randomly...........................................passed And press on ADD TO CART button.............................................passed Then the product is added to the user's shopping cart and message appears says The product has been added to your shopping cart.passed

testcase.name: user could add products to wishlist
testcase.system-out: Given user had an actual account............................................passed And open home page again....................................................passed Given user scrolls down to products.........................................passed When user presses on add to wishlist........................................passed Then user chooses attributes for product if found...........................passed And user found the product that he added to wishlist in the wishlist........passed And open home page again....................................................passed And user adds another product to the Wishlist...............................passed And logged user navigates to his Wishlist page..............................passed

testcase.classname: user could add different products to Compare list
testcase.name: user could add different products to Compare list
testcase.system-out: Given user had an actual account............................................passed And open home page again....................................................passed Given user adds First Product to CompareList................................passed And user adds Second Product to CompareList.................................passed And user adds Third Product to CompareList..................................passed When user goes to CompareProductsList.......................................passed And user deletes all the choosedProducts....................................passed

testcase.name: user could Create Successful Order
testcase.system-out: Given open home page again..................................................passed And open shopping page......................................................passed When user agrees with terms and proceed to Checkout.........................passed And user enters email address...............................................passed And user enters password....................................................passed And user pressed on Log-in button...........................................passed And user agrees with terms and proceed to Checkout..........................passed And user types Billing address to Create Order..............................passed And user confirms Billing address...........................................passed And user chooses Shipping Method to Continue................................passed And user chooses Payment Method to Continue.................................passed And user fills out Payment Information......................................passed Then user confirms his order................................................passed And user checks order details...............................................passed And user saves invoice......................................................passed And user prints invoice.....................................................passed
